Monday: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. – Arthur Ashe
Tuesday: Make it work, then make it better. – Kent Beck
Wednesday: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency. – Austin Freeman
Thursday: Fix the cause, not the symptom. – Steve Maguire
Friday: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad. – Cory House
Saturday: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code. – John Johnson
Sunday: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes. – Oscar Wilde
